item.title: code add (bug FOR-967)

code add by RDG (fixes bug FOR-967)
:
Add handling of RSS feeds. Thanks to Stuart Yeates.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
content-doap-link dispatcher template to embed a link to the raw DOAP files within an output HTML file.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
doap-embedded dispatcher template added. This allows DOAP files to be embedded within an output HTML file.
